title: Basil Wolverton - Far-Out Weird Ass Tales Of The Future 1-3
description:
Hard to find clear info on these. Bootlegs maybe? Pretty sure they're some kind of bootleg (be it digital or print). Definitely reprints, though, because Basil never released anything with the word "ass" on the cover. For that matter, he never released anything with the words "far-out" in the title, either. The original title, I believe, was just Weird Tales of the Future.

--------------------------------------------------------------- 

Basil Wolverton - Far-Out Weird Ass Tales Of The Future 1-3

Key Publications, 1952-53 (originally, for both the publisher and year, not sure on these editions), 26-35 pages

Issues 1 & 2 are color, Issue 3 is b&w, great scans on all of them regardless of where they came from

Written and Illustrated by Basil Wolverton

Some coloring by Steve Oliff in Issue 1
